forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening clouds will give way to clearing. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then clearing later on. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
